localProof.headline: Where to Find Us in Midland
localProof.directions: We are conveniently located at 4610 N Midkiff Road, right near the Midland Park Mall and just a short drive from the Petroleum Museum. If you are taking I-20, use Exit 136 toward Downtown Midland for easy access.

productLinks.headline: Financial Services Available in Midland
productLinks.intro: Midland and Permian Basin residents trust Ace Payday Loans for fast, transparent financial solutions. We understand the unique needs of oil field workers and offer flexible services:

services.name: Payday Loans
services.description: Short-term loans to cover unexpected expenses until your next paycheck

services.name: Cash Advances
services.description: Quick access to cash for emergency situations

services.name: Installment Loans

services.name: Check Cashing

services.name: Online Payday Loans
services.description: Apply from home and get funded fast

services.name: Same Day Loans

services.name: Bad Credit Loans

stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Payday Loan Laws in Midland, Texas
stateCompliance.content: Midland residents are protected by both Texas state lending regulations and a local city ordinance that provides additional consumer protections. Texas allows payday loans through licensed Credit Access Businesses (CABs), and Ace Payday Loans is fully licensed and compliant with all state and local requirements.
stateCompliance.localOrdinanceNote: Midland has enacted a local payday lending ordinance that provides additional consumer protections. Under this ordinance, payday loans are limited to 20% of your gross monthly income, and rollovers are limited to 3 with a 25% principal reduction each time.
keyPoints: Texas allows payday loans through licensed Credit Access Businesses (CABs) regulated by the OCCC
Midland has a local ordinance limiting payday loans to 20% of gross monthly income
Maximum 3 rollovers allowed with 25% principal reduction each time (city ordinance)
You have the right to cancel your loan within 3 days of signing without penalty
Lenders cannot threaten criminal prosecution for non-payment (except for fraud)
Your wages cannot be garnished for payday loan debt under Texas law
Always verify your lender is licensed at occc.texas.gov before borrowing
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: Texas Office of Consumer Credit Commissioner (OCCC)

warningBox.title: Important Cost Warning
warningBox.content: Payday loans in Texas are among the most expensive in the nation. A typical $300 loan can cost over $1,000 in fees alone, resulting in APRs exceeding 700%. Consider alternatives such as credit union loans, payment plans with creditors, or nonprofit credit counseling before taking out a payday loan.

stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal advice. Payday loan laws and regulations change frequently. For the most accurate and up-to-date information, contact the Texas OCCC at (800) 538-1579 or visit occc.texas.gov. If you need legal advice, please consult with a licensed attorney in Texas.

reviews.name: Travis B.
reviews.text: Working in the oil field means sometimes pay is inconsistent. Ace helped me bridge the gap when I needed it. Fast service and they understand the Permian Basin lifestyle.

reviews.name: Melissa R.
reviews.text: Great location near the mall. The staff was friendly and the approval was quick. They explained the Midland city rules which was helpful.

reviews.name: Daniel K.
reviews.text: Needed emergency cash for truck repairs. They got me approved the same day. Location on Midkiff is easy to find coming off I-20.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Cities
nearbyLocations.intro: Cannot make it to our Midland location? We also serve:

faq.question: Where is your Midland location?
faq.answer: Our Midland branch is located at 4610 N Midkiff Road, Suite 204, near Midland Park Mall. Take I-20 Exit 136 toward Downtown Midland for the quickest route.

faq.question: What are your hours in Midland?
faq.answer: We are open Monday through Friday 9 AM to 7 PM, and Saturday 10 AM to 4 PM. We are closed on Sundays.

faq.question: Does Midland have special payday loan rules?
faq.answer: Yes, Midland has a local ordinance that limits payday loans to 20% of your gross monthly income and restricts rollovers to a maximum of 3 with 25% principal reduction each time.

faq.question: Do you work with oil field workers with irregular pay schedules?
faq.answer: Yes, we understand that many Permian Basin workers have variable pay schedules. We work with your specific pay cycle to create a repayment plan that fits your situation.

faq.question: What do I need to bring to the Midland location?
faq.answer: Bring a valid government ID, proof of income (pay stub or bank statement), and an active checking account. For title loans, also bring your vehicle and clear title.
